meanings.definition: An embodiment or personification of a deity or idea.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the avatar of wisdom guided the hero on his journey.
meanings.sent2: She customized her avatar to look like her favorite character in the game.
meanings.sent3: The avatar of happiness danced joyfully around the room.
meanings.sent4: His avatar of courage stood tall in the face of danger.
meanings.sent5: The avatar of peace radiated calmness and serenity to all around.

meanings.definition: A graphical representation of a user in a virtual reality or online community.
meanings.sent1: The avatar on the screen mirrored every move the player made.
meanings.sent2: He chose a cool outfit for his avatar to wear in the game.
meanings.sent3: The avatar suddenly started breakdancing, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her avatar glowed with a digital aura, standing out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The avatar's expression changed to reflect the user's emotions in real-time.

meanings.sent1: The mysterious figure seemed like an avatar of the night, blending into the shadows.
meanings.sent2: His sudden appearance at the party was like an avatar of surprise.
meanings.sent3: The cake transformed into an avatar of deliciousness as soon as it was served.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered, forming an avatar of impending rain.
meanings.sent5: The bright rainbow was nature's avatar of hope after the storm.
